name: Sokoboxes Duo
description:
A new game based on Sokoban.

There are boxes that need to be organised in a warehouse at the Sokoboxes company in Mount Fuji, Japan.

Choose between 4 characters to play with: Penguin, Bear, Neko and Rexy.

There are game modes: Duo and Solo.
In Duo mode, each level has two characters. You can control both characters using either one or two controllers. If you choose two controllers, you can decide to play by taking turns or by playing together.
In Solo mode, each level has just one character.

Penguin is from Antarctica, Bear is from the Arctic, Neko is from Tokyo and Rexy’s origin is currently unknown.

Cute graphics and sound effects.

There are more than 110 Duo levels and more than 200 Solo levels available to play.
All levels are categorised by difficulty, so you will play progressively harder puzzles as you complete each level.
The difficulty starts from easy to near impossible:

Beginner, Easy, Amateur, Intermediate, Advanced, Proficient, Hard, Expert, Ultimate.

Included within the game is the first chapter of the comic series, which features the characters and showcases their thrilling adventures!

Note: A mouse is required for navigating and interacting with the game's UI menus and buttons. However, the gameplay itself can be enjoyed using either a keyboard or joysticks.
